metadata.title: CVE-2023-43786 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to an infinite loop within thePutSubImage() function. This flaw allows a local user to consume allavailable system resources and cause a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: libx11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libxpm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
motif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
